std.value: What’s wrong with your car? When will you get the car back?
std.ai: What’s wrong with your car? When will you get the car back?

std.value: Why is the car recalled? How long will it take to have it repaired?
std.ai: Why is the car recalled? How long will it take to have it repaired?

std.value: Where is your car made? Is the problem serious?
std.ai: Where is your car made? Is the problem serious?

std.value: When did you buy the car? Will you buy a new car of the same brand?
std.ai: When did you buy the car? Will you buy a new car of the same brand?

std.value: How will you go to work before the car is returned? When can it be returned?
std.ai: How will you go to work before the car is returned? When can it be returned?

question.ask: Questions 1~2  Your father’s car has just been recalled by the car company. Ask your father two questions about the car.
question.keywords: What wrong with car|When will get car back|Why is car recalled|How long will take have repaired|Where is car made|Is problem serious|When did buy car|Will buy car same brand|How will go work|When can be returned

question.ask: Questions 3~4  Your next-door neighbor is walking her new dog in the garden. Ask her two questions about the dog.

std.value: What is the name of your dog? How often do you walk it?
std.ai: What is the name of your dog? How often do you walk it?

std.value: Where did you get it? Does it like playing with other dogs?
std.ai: Where did you get it? Does it like playing with other dogs?

std.value: What is it called? Is it friendly to people?
std.ai: What is it called? Is it friendly to people?

std.value: How long have you had your dog? Do you treat it as your family member?
std.ai: How long have you had your dog? Do you treat it as your family member?

std.value: How old is your dog? What does it like to eat?
std.ai: How old is your dog? What does it like to eat?

std.value: Do you walk your dog every day? Where do you usually walk it?
std.ai: Do you walk your dog every day? Where do you usually walk it?

std.value: Is your dog male or female? Is it friendly?
std.ai: Is your dog male or female? Is it friendly?

std.value: Where do you bath your dog, at home or at a pet store? How often do you have it bathed?
std.ai: Where do you bath your dog, at home or at a pet store? How often do you have it bathed?

std.value: What do you usually feed your dog? Do you feed it bones?
std.ai: What do you usually feed your dog? Do you feed it bones?
